recipe.title: Tomato Sauce
recipe.ingredients: 2 Kg Tomatoes 600g Apple 3 big Onions 510 g Sugar 55 g Salt 1 1/4 C Vinegar 10 g Cloves 1/2 tsp Black Peppercorns 1/2 tsp all-spice
recipe.steps: Dice Tomatoes, apples and onions. Put spices into a muslin bag Put all the ingredients into a pot. Boil for 3 Hours. Remove spices and blend in a food processor. Reheat and put in sterilized bottles.
